has carved himself into legend with his historic escapades, fearlessly
facing extreme danger and overwhelming odds with no second thought.

children all around the world who grow up aspiring to be as respected and
admired as the Great Adventurer himself. There is something truly special
about this individual, very special indeed.

entities that now roam free fill the hallowed halls with their woeful cries
